title: Lot of 20 T3s...mostly raw FR to VG
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: Lot of 20 T3s...mostly raw FR to VG
posts.post_content:
Really nice lot of 20 T3s...4 graded and the rest are raw between PR and VG...

$2600 shipped for the lot

HOF: Sam Crawford FR, Frank Baker beater, Fred Clarke beater

Graded Commons: Red Kleinow SGC 30, Nap Rucker, SGC 20, Ed Lennox SGC 30, Bill Donovan SGC 20

Commons: Jack Pfeister GD, Al Bridwell FR (VG appearance, pinhole), Bill Carrigan FR, Lou Criger GDmk, George Gibson (2) VG and FR, Doc Hofman GDmk, Hans Lobert PR (pinholes), Fred Merkle GD, Pat Moran FR (VG apperance, pinhole), Harry Niles FR, Admiral Schlei VG, Chief Wilson GDmk
